## R Markdown

```{r}
install.packages("treemapify")

```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(treemapify)

value <- c(13452,10621,8866,6184,4223,3171,1991,1029,421,42)

number <- c("9","8","7","6","5","4","3","2","1","0")

tb <- tibble(x=number,y=value)
tb


ggplot(tb, aes(area = y, fill = x)) + geom_treemap() + scale_fill_viridis_d()
ggsave("treemap.png")

```
